participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Playful and outgoing, loves music and enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I have a cat and he is the light of my life. I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis. I have 5 brothers and sisters. My favorite band is the Rolling Stones. I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and nurturing, balances a fun-loving spirit with a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_2.background: I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home. My weight is not an issue for me. Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. I've been in a relationship for 2 years. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of The Rolling Stones!
Hey! I love them too. What's your favorite song?
I love Paint It Black. What's yours?
I love Sympathy for the Devil. Have you seen them in concert?
No, I haven't had a chance yet. I've heard they're great live.
They are! I saw them a few years ago and it was amazing.
I'm so jealous! I hope I can get to see them soon.
Fingers crossed!
Thanks! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to travel. I've been to a few different countries and I'm always looking for new places to visit.
That's awesome! I love to travel too. Where's your favorite place you've been?
I think my favorite place was Thailand. The people were so friendly and the food was amazing.
Thailand sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also love to teach. I'm a mom and I love teaching my kids new things.
That's really great! I bet your kids love learning from you.
They do! I love seeing them excited to learn new things.
That's so sweet. I'm sure they're lucky to have you as their mom.
Thanks! I love being their mom.
It sounds like you have a lot of fun things to do!
I do! I'm a lucky person.
You sound like it
